channel.description: Recent content in untagged on naomo

item.title: 【vim】Jump with ctags
item.description: Install ctags brew install --HEAD universal-ctags/universal-ctags/universal-ctags Create a tag file Execute ctags -Rf .tags to generate .tags. ctags analyzes the source codes on the current directly recursively. Try to jump Execute :set tags=.tags on vim. (It is recomended to register this command to .vimrc) Execute a vim command :ta <word> or type ctrl+] on a <word> to jump to the definition.
